Text.Page:
There are those who seek power for the sake of power, and those who seek it for the sake of the world.

If you are the latter, visit Henan in Highwatch.

Ah, a berserker, seeking to expand your knowledge. I can show you new ways to use your existing skills, but for true mastery you must visit Tarkloon. He will teach you how to harness your rage to protect others.

Until you do, you won't be able to use Fiery Rage VI, Unchained Anger VIII, and Axe Block II to their full potential.

If you've come to me for training, it means you're ready to become more than just a killer. Are you ready to take the next step? Working with me will change everything you know about yourself.

Few berserkers make it this far without surrendering to their rage at least once. I'm going to teach you to transform that anger into something wonderful.
